5371  boost::asio::io_service* io_service_{};
5372  std::deque<std::pair<decltype(std::chrono::steady_clock::now()), std::function<void()>>> dq_;
5373  int step_{};
5374  };
5375  }
5376 }
5377 
5378 
5379 
5380 #pragma once
5381 
5382 #include <cstdint>
5383 #include <stdexcept>
5384 #include <tuple>
5385 #include <type_traits>
5386 #include <cstring>
5387 #include <functional>
5388 
5389 namespace crow
5390 {
5391  namespace black_magic
5392  {
5393 #ifndef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
5394  struct OutOfRange
5395  {
5396  OutOfRange(unsigned pos, unsigned length) {}
5397  };
5398  constexpr unsigned requires_in_range( unsigned i, unsigned len )
5399  {
5400  return i >= len ? throw OutOfRange(i, len) : i;
5401  }
5402 
5403  class const_str
5404  {
5405  const char * const begin_;
5406  unsigned size_;
5407 
5408  public:
5409  template< unsigned N >
5410  constexpr const_str( const char(&arr)[N] ) : begin_(arr), size_(N - 1) {
5411  static_assert( N >= 1, "not a string literal");
5412  }
5413  constexpr char operator[]( unsigned i ) const {
5414  return requires_in_range(i, size_), begin_[i];
5415  }
5416 
5417  constexpr operator const char *() const {
5418  return begin_;
5419  }
5420 
5421  constexpr const char* begin() const { return begin_; }
5422  constexpr const char* end() const { return begin_ + size_; }
5423 
5424  constexpr unsigned size() const {
5425  return size_;
5426  }
5427  };
5428 
5429  constexpr unsigned find_closing_tag(const_str s, unsigned p)
5430  {
5431  return s[p] == '>' ? p : find_closing_tag(s, p+1);
5432  }
5433 
5434  constexpr bool is_valid(const_str s, unsigned i = 0, int f = 0)
5435  {
5436  return
5437  i == s.size()
5438  ? f == 0 :
5439  f < 0 || f >= 2
5440  ? false :
5441  s[i] == '<'
5442  ? is_valid(s, i+1, f+1) :
5443  s[i] == '>'
5444  ? is_valid(s, i+1, f-1) :
5445  is_valid(s, i+1, f);
5446  }
5447 
5448  constexpr bool is_equ_p(const char* a, const char* b, unsigned n)
5449  {
5450  return
5451  *a == 0 && *b == 0 && n == 0
5452  ? true :
5453  (*a == 0 || *b == 0)
5454  ? false :
5455  n == 0
5456  ? true :
5457  *a != *b
5458  ? false :
5459  is_equ_p(a+1, b+1, n-1);
5460  }
5461 
5462  constexpr bool is_equ_n(const_str a, unsigned ai, const_str b, unsigned bi, unsigned n)
5463  {
5464  return
5465  ai + n > a.size() || bi + n > b.size()
5466  ? false :
5467  n == 0
5468  ? true :
5469  a[ai] != b[bi]
5470  ? false :
5471  is_equ_n(a,ai+1,b,bi+1,n-1);
5472  }
5473 
5474  constexpr bool is_int(const_str s, unsigned i)
5475  {
5476  return is_equ_n(s, i, "<int>", 0, 5);
5477  }
5478 
5479  constexpr bool is_uint(const_str s, unsigned i)
5480  {
5481  return is_equ_n(s, i, "<uint>", 0, 6);
5482  }
5483 
5484  constexpr bool is_float(const_str s, unsigned i)
5485  {
5486  return is_equ_n(s, i, "<float>", 0, 7) ||
5487  is_equ_n(s, i, "<double>", 0, 8);
5488  }
5489 
5490  constexpr bool is_str(const_str s, unsigned i)
5491  {
5492  return is_equ_n(s, i, "<str>", 0, 5) ||
5493  is_equ_n(s, i, "<string>", 0, 8);
5494  }
5495 
5496  constexpr bool is_path(const_str s, unsigned i)
5497  {
5498  return is_equ_n(s, i, "<path>", 0, 6);
5499  }
5500 #endif
5501  template <typename T>
5502  struct parameter_tag
5503  {
5504  static const int value = 0;
5505  };
5506 #define CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(t, i) \
5507 template <> \
5508 struct parameter_tag<t> \
5509 { \
5510  static const int value = i; \
5511 };
5512  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(int, 1);
5513  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(char, 1);
5514  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(short, 1);
5515  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(long, 1);
5516  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(long long, 1);
5517  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(unsigned int, 2);
5518  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(unsigned char, 2);
5519  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(unsigned short, 2);
5520  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(unsigned long, 2);
5521  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(unsigned long long, 2);
5522  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(double, 3);
5523  CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG(std::string, 4);
5524 #undef CROW_INTERNAL_PARAMETER_TAG
5525  template <typename ... Args>
5526  struct compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list;
5527 
5528  template <>
5529  struct compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list<>
5530  {
5531  static const int value = 0;
5532  };
5533 
5534  template <typename Arg, typename ... Args>
5535  struct compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list<Arg, Args...>
5536  {
5537  static const int sub_value =
5538  compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list<Args...>::value;
5539  static const int value =
5540  parameter_tag<typename std::decay<Arg>::type>::value
5541  ? sub_value* 6 + parameter_tag<typename std::decay<Arg>::type>::value
5542  : sub_value;
5543  };
5544 
5545  static inline bool is_parameter_tag_compatible(uint64_t a, uint64_t b)
5546  {
5547  if (a == 0)
5548  return b == 0;
5549  if (b == 0)
5550  return a == 0;
5551  int sa = a%6;
5552  int sb = a%6;
5553  if (sa == 5) sa = 4;
5554  if (sb == 5) sb = 4;
5555  if (sa != sb)
5556  return false;
5557  return is_parameter_tag_compatible(a/6, b/6);
5558  }
5559 
5560  static inline unsigned find_closing_tag_runtime(const char* s, unsigned p)
5561  {
5562  return
5563  s[p] == 0
5564  ? throw std::runtime_error("unmatched tag <") :
5565  s[p] == '>'
5566  ? p : find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p + 1);
5567  }
5568 
5569  static inline uint64_t get_parameter_tag_runtime(const char* s, unsigned p = 0)
5570  {
5571  return
5572  s[p] == 0
5573  ? 0 :
5574  s[p] == '<' ? (
5575  std::strncmp(s+p, "<int>", 5) == 0
5576  ? get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p)) * 6 + 1 :
5577  std::strncmp(s+p, "<uint>", 6) == 0
5578  ? get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p)) * 6 + 2 :
5579  (std::strncmp(s+p, "<float>", 7) == 0 ||
5580  std::strncmp(s+p, "<double>", 8) == 0)
5581  ? get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p)) * 6 + 3 :
5582  (std::strncmp(s+p, "<str>", 5) == 0 ||
5583  std::strncmp(s+p, "<string>", 8) == 0)
5584  ? get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p)) * 6 + 4 :
5585  std::strncmp(s+p, "<path>", 6) == 0
5586  ? get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, find_closing_tag_runtime(s, p)) * 6 + 5 :
5587  throw std::runtime_error("invalid parameter type")
5588  ) :
5589  get_parameter_tag_runtime(s, p+1);
5590  }
5591 #ifndef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
5592  constexpr uint64_t get_parameter_tag(const_str s, unsigned p = 0)
5593  {
5594  return
5595  p == s.size()
5596  ? 0 :
5597  s[p] == '<' ? (
5598  is_int(s, p)
5599  ? get_parameter_tag(s, find_closing_tag(s, p)) * 6 + 1 :
5600  is_uint(s, p)
5601  ? get_parameter_tag(s, find_closing_tag(s, p)) * 6 + 2 :
5602  is_float(s, p)
5603  ? get_parameter_tag(s, find_closing_tag(s, p)) * 6 + 3 :
5604  is_str(s, p)
5605  ? get_parameter_tag(s, find_closing_tag(s, p)) * 6 + 4 :
5606  is_path(s, p)
5607  ? get_parameter_tag(s, find_closing_tag(s, p)) * 6 + 5 :
5608  throw std::runtime_error("invalid parameter type")
5609  ) :
5610  get_parameter_tag(s, p+1);
5611  }
5612 #endif
5613 
5614  template <typename ... T>
5615  struct S
5616  {
5617  template <typename U>
5618  using push = S<U, T...>;
5619  template <typename U>
5620  using push_back = S<T..., U>;
5621  template <template<typename ... Args> class U>
5622  using rebind = U<T...>;
5623  };
5624 template <typename F, typename Set>
5625  struct CallHelper;
5626  template <typename F, typename ...Args>
5627  struct CallHelper<F, S<Args...>>
5628  {
5629  template <typename F1, typename ...Args1, typename =
5630  decltype(std::declval<F1>()(std::declval<Args1>()...))
5631  >
5632  static char __test(int);
5633 
5634  template <typename ...>
5635  static int __test(...);
5636 
5637  static constexpr bool value = sizeof(__test<F, Args...>(0)) == sizeof(char);
5638  };
5639 
5640 
5641  template <int N>
5642  struct single_tag_to_type
5643  {
5644  };
5645 
5646  template <>
5647  struct single_tag_to_type<1>
5648  {
5649  using type = int64_t;
5650  };
5651 
5652  template <>
5653  struct single_tag_to_type<2>
5654  {
5655  using type = uint64_t;
5656  };
5657 
5658  template <>
5659  struct single_tag_to_type<3>
5660  {
5661  using type = double;
5662  };
5663 
5664  template <>
5665  struct single_tag_to_type<4>
5666  {
5667  using type = std::string;
5668  };
5669 
5670  template <>
5671  struct single_tag_to_type<5>
5672  {
5673  using type = std::string;
5674  };
5675 
5676 
5677  template <uint64_t Tag>
5678  struct arguments
5679  {
5680  using subarguments = typename arguments<Tag/6>::type;
5681  using type =
5682  typename subarguments::template push<typename single_tag_to_type<Tag%6>::type>;
5683  };
5684 
5685  template <>
5686  struct arguments<0>
5687  {
5688  using type = S<>;
5689  };
5690 
5691  template <typename ... T>
5692  struct last_element_type
5693  {
5694  using type = typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(T)-1, std::tuple<T...>>::type;
5695  };
5696 
5697 
5698  template <>
5699  struct last_element_type<>
5700  {
5701  };
5702 
5703 
5704  // from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13072359/c11-compile-time-array-with-logarithmic-evaluation-depth
5705  template<class T> using Invoke = typename T::type;
5706 
5707  template<unsigned...> struct seq{ using type = seq; };
5708 
5709  template<class S1, class S2> struct concat;
5710 
5711  template<unsigned... I1, unsigned... I2>
5712  struct concat<seq<I1...>, seq<I2...>>
5713  : seq<I1..., (sizeof...(I1)+I2)...>{};
5714 
5715  template<class S1, class S2>
5716  using Concat = Invoke<concat<S1, S2>>;
5717 
5718  template<unsigned N> struct gen_seq;
5719  template<unsigned N> using GenSeq = Invoke<gen_seq<N>>;
5720 
5721  template<unsigned N>
5722  struct gen_seq : Concat<GenSeq<N/2>, GenSeq<N - N/2>>{};
5723 
5724  template<> struct gen_seq<0> : seq<>{};
5725  template<> struct gen_seq<1> : seq<0>{};
5726 
5727  template <typename Seq, typename Tuple>
5728  struct pop_back_helper;
5729 
5730  template <unsigned ... N, typename Tuple>
5731  struct pop_back_helper<seq<N...>, Tuple>
5732  {
5733  template <template <typename ... Args> class U>
5734  using rebind = U<typename std::tuple_element<N, Tuple>::type...>;
5735  };
5736 
5737  template <typename ... T>
5738  struct pop_back //: public pop_back_helper<typename gen_seq<sizeof...(T)-1>::type, std::tuple<T...>>
5739  {
5740  template <template <typename ... Args> class U>
5741  using rebind = typename pop_back_helper<typename gen_seq<sizeof...(T)-1>::type, std::tuple<T...>>::template rebind<U>;
5742  };
5743 
5744  template <>
5745  struct pop_back<>
5746  {
5747  template <template <typename ... Args> class U>
5748  using rebind = U<>;
5749  };
5750 
5751  // from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2118541/check-if-c0x-parameter-pack-contains-a-type
5752  template < typename Tp, typename... List >
5753  struct contains : std::true_type {};
5754 
5755  template < typename Tp, typename Head, typename... Rest >
5756  struct contains<Tp, Head, Rest...>
5757  : std::conditional< std::is_same<Tp, Head>::value,
5758  std::true_type,
5759  contains<Tp, Rest...>
5760  >::type {};
5761 
5762  template < typename Tp >
5763  struct contains<Tp> : std::false_type {};
5764 
5765  template <typename T>
5766  struct empty_context
5767  {
5768  };
5769 
5770  template <typename T>
5771  struct promote
5772  {
5773  using type = T;
5774  };
5775 
5776 #define CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(t1, t2) \
5777  template<> \
5778  struct promote<t1> \
5779  { \
5780  using type = t2; \
5781  }
5782 
5783  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(char, int64_t);
5784  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(short, int64_t);
5785  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(int, int64_t);
5786  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(long, int64_t);
5787  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(long long, int64_t);
5788  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(unsigned char, uint64_t);
5789  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(unsigned short, uint64_t);
5790  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(unsigned int, uint64_t);
5791  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(unsigned long, uint64_t);
5792  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(unsigned long long, uint64_t);
5793  CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE(float, double);
5794 #undef CROW_INTERNAL_PROMOTE_TYPE
5795 
5796  template <typename T>
5797  using promote_t = typename promote<T>::type;
5798 
5799  } // namespace black_magic
5800 
5801  namespace detail
5802  {
5803 
5804  template <class T, std::size_t N, class... Args>
5805  struct get_index_of_element_from_tuple_by_type_impl
5806  {
5807  static constexpr auto value = N;
5808  };
5809 
5810  template <class T, std::size_t N, class... Args>
5811  struct get_index_of_element_from_tuple_by_type_impl<T, N, T, Args...>
5812  {
5813  static constexpr auto value = N;
5814  };
5815 
5816  template <class T, std::size_t N, class U, class... Args>
5817  struct get_index_of_element_from_tuple_by_type_impl<T, N, U, Args...>
5818  {
5819  static constexpr auto value = get_index_of_element_from_tuple_by_type_impl<T, N + 1, Args...>::value;
5820  };
5821 
5822  } // namespace detail
5823 
5824  namespace utility
5825  {
5826  template <class T, class... Args>
5827  T& get_element_by_type(std::tuple<Args...>& t)
5828  {
5829  return std::get<detail::get_index_of_element_from_tuple_by_type_impl<T, 0, Args...>::value>(t);
5830  }
5831 
5832  template<typename T>
5833  struct function_traits;
5834 
5835 #ifndef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
5836  template<typename T>
5837  struct function_traits : public function_traits<decltype(&T::operator())>
5838  {
5839  using parent_t = function_traits<decltype(&T::operator())>;
5840  static const size_t arity = parent_t::arity;
5841  using result_type = typename parent_t::result_type;
5842  template <size_t i>
5843  using arg = typename parent_t::template arg<i>;
5844 
5845  };
5846 #endif
5847 
5848  template<typename ClassType, typename R, typename ...Args>
5849  struct function_traits<R(ClassType::*)(Args...) const>
5850  {
5851  static const size_t arity = sizeof...(Args);
5852 
5853  typedef R result_type;
5854 
5855  template <size_t i>
5856  using arg = typename std::tuple_element<i, std::tuple<Args...>>::type;
5857  };
5858 
5859  template<typename ClassType, typename R, typename ...Args>
5860  struct function_traits<R(ClassType::*)(Args...)>
5861  {
5862  static const size_t arity = sizeof...(Args);
5863 
5864  typedef R result_type;
5865 
5866  template <size_t i>
5867  using arg = typename std::tuple_element<i, std::tuple<Args...>>::type;
5868  };
5869 
5870  template<typename R, typename ...Args>
5871  struct function_traits<std::function<R(Args...)>>
5872  {
5873  static const size_t arity = sizeof...(Args);
5874 
5875  typedef R result_type;
5876 
5877  template <size_t i>
5878  using arg = typename std::tuple_element<i, std::tuple<Args...>>::type;
5879  };
5880 
5881  } // namespace utility
5882 }
5883 
5884 
5885 
5886 #pragma once
5887 
5888 #include <vector>
5889 #include <string>
5890 #include <stdexcept>
5891 #include <iostream>
5892 
5893 
5894 
5895 namespace crow
5896 {
5897  enum class HTTPMethod
5898  {
5899  DELETE,
5900  GET,
5901  HEAD,
5902  POST,
5903  PUT,
5904  CONNECT,
5905  OPTIONS,
5906  TRACE,
5907  };
5908 
5909  inline std::string method_name(HTTPMethod method)
5910  {
5911  switch(method)
5912  {
5913  case HTTPMethod::DELETE:
5914  return "DELETE";
5915  case HTTPMethod::GET:
5916  return "GET";
5917  case HTTPMethod::HEAD:
5918  return "HEAD";
5919  case HTTPMethod::POST:
5920  return "POST";
5921  case HTTPMethod::PUT:
5922  return "PUT";
5923  case HTTPMethod::CONNECT:
5924  return "CONNECT";
5925  case HTTPMethod::OPTIONS:
5926  return "OPTIONS";
5927  case HTTPMethod::TRACE:
5928  return "TRACE";
5929  }
5930  return "invalid";
5931  }
5932 
5933  enum class ParamType
5934  {
5935  INT,
5936  UINT,
5937  DOUBLE,
5938  STRING,
5939  PATH,
5940 
5941  MAX
5942  };
5943 
5944  struct routing_params
5945  {
5946  std::vector<int64_t> int_params;
5947  std::vector<uint64_t> uint_params;
5948  std::vector<double> double_params;
5949  std::vector<std::string> string_params;
5950 
5951  void debug_print() const
5952  {
5953  std::cerr << "routing_params" << std::endl;
5954  for(auto i:int_params)
5955  std::cerr<<i <<", " ;
5956  std::cerr<<std::endl;
5957  for(auto i:uint_params)
5958  std::cerr<<i <<", " ;
5959  std::cerr<<std::endl;
5960  for(auto i:double_params)
5961  std::cerr<<i <<", " ;
5962  std::cerr<<std::endl;
5963  for(auto& i:string_params)
5964  std::cerr<<i <<", " ;
5965  std::cerr<<std::endl;
5966  }
5967 
5968  template <typename T>
5969  T get(unsigned) const;
5970 
5971  };
5972 
5973  template<>
5974  inline int64_t routing_params::get<int64_t>(unsigned index) const
5975  {
5976  return int_params[index];
5977  }
5978 
5979  template<>
5980  inline uint64_t routing_params::get<uint64_t>(unsigned index) const
5981  {
5982  return uint_params[index];
5983  }
5984 
5985  template<>
5986  inline double routing_params::get<double>(unsigned index) const
5987  {
5988  return double_params[index];
5989  }
5990 
5991  template<>
5992  inline std::string routing_params::get<std::string>(unsigned index) const
5993  {
5994  return string_params[index];
5995  }
5996 }
5997 
5998 #ifndef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
5999 constexpr crow::HTTPMethod operator "" _method(const char* str, size_t len)
6000 {
6001  return
6002  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "GET", 3) ? crow::HTTPMethod::GET :
6003  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "DELETE", 6) ? crow::HTTPMethod::DELETE :
6004  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "HEAD", 4) ? crow::HTTPMethod::HEAD :
6005  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "POST", 4) ? crow::HTTPMethod::POST :
6006  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "PUT", 3) ? crow::HTTPMethod::PUT :
6007  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "OPTIONS", 7) ? crow::HTTPMethod::OPTIONS :
6008  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "CONNECT", 7) ? crow::HTTPMethod::CONNECT :
6009  crow::black_magic::is_equ_p(str, "TRACE", 5) ? crow::HTTPMethod::TRACE :
6010  throw std::runtime_error("invalid http method");
6011 };
6012 #endif
6013 
6014 
6015 
6016 #pragma once
6017 
6018 
6019 
6020 
6021 
6022 
6023 
6024 
6025 namespace crow
6026 {
6027  template <typename T>
6028  inline const std::string& get_header_value(const T& headers, const std::string& key)
6029  {
6030  if (headers.count(key))
6031  {
6032  return headers.find(key)->second;
6033  }
6034  static std::string empty;
6035  return empty;
6036  }
6037 
6038  struct request
6039  {
6040  HTTPMethod method;
6041  std::string raw_url;
6042  std::string url;
6043  query_string url_params;
6044  ci_map headers;
6045  std::string body;
6046 
6047  void* middleware_context{};
6048 
6049  request()
6050  : method(HTTPMethod::GET)
6051  {
6052  }
6053 
6054  request(HTTPMethod method, std::string raw_url, std::string url, query_string url_params, ci_map headers, std::string body)
6055  : method(method), raw_url(std::move(raw_url)), url(std::move(url)), url_params(std::move(url_params)), headers(std::move(headers)), body(std::move(body))
6056  {
6057  }
6058 
6059  void add_header(std::string key, std::string value)
6060  {
6061  headers.emplace(std::move(key), std::move(value));
6062  }
6063 
6064  const std::string& get_header_value(const std::string& key) const
6065  {
6066  return crow::get_header_value(headers, key);
6067  }
6068 
6069  };
6070 }
6071 
6072 
6073 
6074 #pragma once
6075 
6076 #include <string>
6077 #include <unordered_map>
6078 #include <boost/algorithm/string.hpp>
6079 #include <boost/tokenizer.hpp>
6080 #include <algorithm>
6081 
6082 
6083 
6084 
6085 
6086 
6087 namespace crow
6088 {
6089  template <typename Handler>
6090  struct HTTPParser : public http_parser
6091  {
6092  static int on_message_begin(http_parser* self_)
6093  {
6094  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6095  self->clear();
6096  return 0;
6097  }
6098  static int on_url(http_parser* self_, const char* at, size_t length)
6099  {
6100  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6101  self->raw_url.insert(self->raw_url.end(), at, at+length);
6102  return 0;
6103  }
6104  static int on_header_field(http_parser* self_, const char* at, size_t length)
6105  {
6106  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6107  switch (self->header_building_state)
6108  {
6109  case 0:
6110  if (!self->header_value.empty())
6111  {
6112  self->headers.emplace(std::move(self->header_field), std::move(self->header_value));
6113  }
6114  self->header_field.assign(at, at+length);
6115  self->header_building_state = 1;
6116  break;
6117  case 1:
6118  self->header_field.insert(self->header_field.end(), at, at+length);
6119  break;
6120  }
6121  return 0;
6122  }
6123  static int on_header_value(http_parser* self_, const char* at, size_t length)
6124  {
6125  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6126  switch (self->header_building_state)
6127  {
6128  case 0:
6129  self->header_value.insert(self->header_value.end(), at, at+length);
6130  break;
6131  case 1:
6132  self->header_building_state = 0;
6133  self->header_value.assign(at, at+length);
6134  break;
6135  }
6136  return 0;
6137  }
6138  static int on_headers_complete(http_parser* self_)
6139  {
6140  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6141  if (!self->header_field.empty())
6142  {
6143  self->headers.emplace(std::move(self->header_field), std::move(self->header_value));
6144  }
6145  self->process_header();
6146  return 0;
6147  }
6148  static int on_body(http_parser* self_, const char* at, size_t length)
6149  {
6150  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6151  self->body.insert(self->body.end(), at, at+length);
6152  return 0;
6153  }
6154  static int on_message_complete(http_parser* self_)
6155  {
6156  HTTPParser* self = static_cast<HTTPParser*>(self_);
6157 
6158  // url params
6159  self->url = self->raw_url.substr(0, self->raw_url.find("?"));
6160  self->url_params = query_string(self->raw_url);
6161 
6162  self->process_message();
6163  return 0;
6164  }
6165  HTTPParser(Handler* handler) :
6166  handler_(handler)
6167  {
6168  http_parser_init(this, HTTP_REQUEST);
6169  }
6170 
6171  // return false on error
6172  bool feed(const char* buffer, int length)
6173  {
6174  const static http_parser_settings settings_{
6175  on_message_begin,
6176  on_url,
6177  nullptr,
6178  on_header_field,
6179  on_header_value,
6180  on_headers_complete,
6181  on_body,
6182  on_message_complete,
6183  };
6184 
6185  int nparsed = http_parser_execute(this, &settings_, buffer, length);
6186  return nparsed == length;
6187  }
6188 
6189  bool done()
6190  {
6191  return feed(nullptr, 0);
6192  }
6193 
6194  void clear()
6195  {
6196  url.clear();
6197  raw_url.clear();
6198  header_building_state = 0;
6199  header_field.clear();
6200  header_value.clear();
6201  headers.clear();
6202  url_params.clear();
6203  body.clear();
6204  }
6205 
6206  void process_header()
6207  {
6208  handler_->handle_header();
6209  }
6210 
6211  void process_message()
6212  {
6213  handler_->handle();
6214  }
6215 
6216  request to_request() const
6217  {
6218  return request{(HTTPMethod)method, std::move(raw_url), std::move(url), std::move(url_params), std::move(headers), std::move(body)};
6219  }
6220 
6221  bool check_version(int major, int minor) const
6222  {
6223  return http_major == major && http_minor == minor;
6224  }
6225 
6226  std::string raw_url;
6227  std::string url;
6228 
6229  int header_building_state = 0;
6230  std::string header_field;
6231  std::string header_value;
6232  ci_map headers;
6233  query_string url_params;
6234  std::string body;
6235 
6236  Handler* handler_;
6237  };
6238 }
6239 
6240 
6241 
6242 #pragma once
6243 #include <string>
6244 #include <unordered_map>
6245 
6246 
6247 
6248 
6249 
6250 
6251 
6252 namespace crow
6253 {
6254  template <typename Adaptor, typename Handler, typename ... Middlewares>
6255  class Connection;
6256  struct response
6257  {
6258  template <typename Adaptor, typename Handler, typename ... Middlewares>
6259  friend class crow::Connection;
6260 
6261  int code{200};
6262  std::string body;
6263  json::wvalue json_value;
6264 
6265  // `headers' stores HTTP headers.
6266  ci_map headers;
6267 
6268  void set_header(std::string key, std::string value)
6269  {
6270  headers.erase(key);
6271  headers.emplace(std::move(key), std::move(value));
6272  }
6273  void add_header(std::string key, std::string value)
6274  {
6275  headers.emplace(std::move(key), std::move(value));
6276  }
6277 
6278  const std::string& get_header_value(const std::string& key)
6279  {
6280  return crow::get_header_value(headers, key);
6281  }
6282 
6283 
6284  response() {}
6285  explicit response(int code) : code(code) {}
6286  response(std::string body) : body(std::move(body)) {}
6287  response(json::wvalue&& json_value) : json_value(std::move(json_value))
6288  {
6289  json_mode();
6290  }
6291  response(int code, std::string body) : code(code), body(std::move(body)) {}
6292  response(const json::wvalue& json_value) : body(json::dump(json_value))
6293  {
6294  json_mode();
6295  }
6296  response(int code, const json::wvalue& json_value) : code(code), body(json::dump(json_value))
6297  {
6298  json_mode();
6299  }
6300 
6301  response(response&& r)
6302  {
6303  *this = std::move(r);
6304  }
6305 
6306  response& operator = (const response& r) = delete;
6307 
6308  response& operator = (response&& r) noexcept
6309  {
6310  body = std::move(r.body);
6311  json_value = std::move(r.json_value);
6312  code = r.code;
6313  headers = std::move(r.headers);
6314  completed_ = r.completed_;
6315  return *this;
6316  }
6317 
6318  bool is_completed() const noexcept
6319  {
6320  return completed_;
6321  }
6322 
6323  void clear()
6324  {
6325  body.clear();
6326  json_value.clear();
6327  code = 200;
6328  headers.clear();
6329  completed_ = false;
6330  }
6331 
6332  void write(const std::string& body_part)
6333  {
6334  body += body_part;
6335  }
6336 
6337  void end()
6338  {
6339  if (!completed_)
6340  {
6341  completed_ = true;
6342 
6343  if (complete_request_handler_)
6344  {
6345  complete_request_handler_();
6346  }
6347  }
6348  }
6349 
6350  void end(const std::string& body_part)
6351  {
6352  body += body_part;
6353  end();
6354  }
6355 
6356  bool is_alive()
6357  {
6358  return is_alive_helper_ && is_alive_helper_();
6359  }
6360 
6361  private:
6362  bool completed_{};
6363  std::function<void()> complete_request_handler_;
6364  std::function<bool()> is_alive_helper_;
6365 
6366  //In case of a JSON object, set the Content-Type header
6367  void json_mode()
6368  {
6369  set_header("Content-Type", "application/json");
6370  }
6371  };
6372 }
6373 
6374 
6375 
6376 #pragma once
6377 #include <boost/algorithm/string/trim.hpp>
6378 
6379 
6380 
6381 
6382 
6383 namespace crow
6384 {
6385  // Any middleware requires following 3 members:
6386 
6387  // struct context;
6388  // storing data for the middleware; can be read from another middleware or handlers
6389 
6390  // before_handle
6391  // called before handling the request.
6392  // if res.end() is called, the operation is halted.
6393  // (still call after_handle of this middleware)
6394  // 2 signatures:
6395  // void before_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx)
6396  // if you only need to access this middlewares context.
6397  // template <typename AllContext>
6398  // void before_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx, AllContext& all_ctx)
6399  // you can access another middlewares' context by calling `all_ctx.template get<MW>()'
6400  // ctx == all_ctx.template get<CurrentMiddleware>()
6401 
6402  // after_handle
6403  // called after handling the request.
6404  // void after_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx)
6405  // template <typename AllContext>
6406  // void after_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx, AllContext& all_ctx)
6407 
6408  struct CookieParser
6409  {
6410  struct context
6411  {
6412  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> jar;
6413  std::unordered_map<std::string, std::string> cookies_to_add;
6414 
6415  std::string get_cookie(const std::string& key)
6416  {
6417  if (jar.count(key))
6418  return jar[key];
6419  return {};
6420  }
6421 
6422  void set_cookie(const std::string& key, const std::string& value)
6423  {
6424  cookies_to_add.emplace(key, value);
6425  }
6426  };
6427 
6428  void before_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx)
6429  {
6430  int count = req.headers.count("Cookie");
6431  if (!count)
6432  return;
6433  if (count > 1)
6434  {
6435  res.code = 400;
6436  res.end();
6437  return;
6438  }
6439  std::string cookies = req.get_header_value("Cookie");
6440  size_t pos = 0;
6441  while(pos < cookies.size())
6442  {
6443  size_t pos_equal = cookies.find('=', pos);
6444  if (pos_equal == cookies.npos)
6445  break;
6446  std::string name = cookies.substr(pos, pos_equal-pos);
6447  boost::trim(name);
6448  pos = pos_equal+1;
6449  while(pos < cookies.size() && cookies[pos] == ' ') pos++;
6450  if (pos == cookies.size())
6451  break;
6452 
6453  std::string value;
6454 
6455  if (cookies[pos] == '"')
6456  {
6457  int dquote_meet_count = 0;
6458  pos ++;
6459  size_t pos_dquote = pos-1;
6460  do
6461  {
6462  pos_dquote = cookies.find('"', pos_dquote+1);
6463  dquote_meet_count ++;
6464  } while(pos_dquote < cookies.size() && cookies[pos_dquote-1] == '\\');
6465  if (pos_dquote == cookies.npos)
6466  break;
6467 
6468  if (dquote_meet_count == 1)
6469  value = cookies.substr(pos, pos_dquote - pos);
6470  else
6471  {
6472  value.clear();
6473  value.reserve(pos_dquote-pos);
6474  for(size_t p = pos; p < pos_dquote; p++)
6475  {
6476  // FIXME minimal escaping
6477  if (cookies[p] == '\\' && p + 1 < pos_dquote)
6478  {
6479  p++;
6480  if (cookies[p] == '\\' || cookies[p] == '"')
6481  value += cookies[p];
6482  else
6483  {
6484  value += '\\';
6485  value += cookies[p];
6486  }
6487  }
6488  else
6489  value += cookies[p];
6490  }
6491  }
6492 
6493  ctx.jar.emplace(std::move(name), std::move(value));
6494  pos = cookies.find(";", pos_dquote+1);
6495  if (pos == cookies.npos)
6496  break;
6497  pos++;
6498  while(pos < cookies.size() && cookies[pos] == ' ') pos++;
6499  if (pos == cookies.size())
6500  break;
6501  }
6502  else
6503  {
6504  size_t pos_semicolon = cookies.find(';', pos);
6505  value = cookies.substr(pos, pos_semicolon - pos);
6506  boost::trim(value);
6507  ctx.jar.emplace(std::move(name), std::move(value));
6508  pos = pos_semicolon;
6509  if (pos == cookies.npos)
6510  break;
6511  pos ++;
6512  while(pos < cookies.size() && cookies[pos] == ' ') pos++;
6513  if (pos == cookies.size())
6514  break;
6515  }
6516  }
6517  }
6518 
6519  void after_handle(request& req, response& res, context& ctx)
6520  {
6521  for(auto& cookie:ctx.cookies_to_add)
6522  {
6523  res.add_header("Set-Cookie", cookie.first + "=" + cookie.second);
6524  }
6525  }
6526  };
6527 
6528  /*
6529  App<CookieParser, AnotherJarMW> app;
6530  A B C
6531  A::context
6532  int aa;
6533 
6534  ctx1 : public A::context
6535  ctx2 : public ctx1, public B::context
6536  ctx3 : public ctx2, public C::context
6537 
6538  C depends on A
6539 
6540  C::handle
6541  context.aaa
6542 
6543  App::context : private CookieParser::contetx, ...
6544  {
6545  jar
6546 
6547  }
6548 
6549  SimpleApp
6550  */
6551 }
6552 
6553 
6554 
6555 #pragma once
6556 
6557 #include <cstdint>
6558 #include <utility>
6559 #include <tuple>
6560 #include <unordered_map>
6561 #include <memory>
6562 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
6563 #include <vector>
6564 
6565 
6566 
6567 
6568 
6569 
6570 
6571 
6572 
6573 
6574 
6575 
6576 namespace crow
6577 {
6578  class BaseRule
6579  {
6580  public:
6581  BaseRule(std::string rule)
6582  : rule_(std::move(rule))
6583  {
6584  }
6585 
6586  virtual ~BaseRule()
6587  {
6588  }
6589 
6590  virtual void validate() = 0;
6591 
6592  virtual void handle(const request&, response&, const routing_params&) = 0;
6593 
6594  uint32_t get_methods()
6595  {
6596  return methods_;
6597  }
6598 
6599  protected:
6600  uint32_t methods_{1<<(int)HTTPMethod::GET};
6601 
6602  std::string rule_;
6603  std::string name_;
6604  friend class Router;
6605  template <typename T>
6606  friend struct RuleParameterTraits;
6607  };
6608 
6609 
6610  namespace detail
6611  {
6612  namespace routing_handler_call_helper
6613  {
6614  template <typename T, int Pos>
6615  struct call_pair
6616  {
6617  using type = T;
6618  static const int pos = Pos;
6619  };
6620 
6621  template <typename H1>
6622  struct call_params
6623  {
6624  H1& handler;
6625  const routing_params& params;
6626  const request& req;
6627  response& res;
6628  };
6629 
6630  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename S1, typename S2>
6631  struct call
6632  {
6633  };
6634 
6635  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename ... Args1, typename ... Args2>
6636  struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<int64_t, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
6637  {
6638  void operator()(F cparams)
6639  {
6640  using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<int64_t, NInt>>;
6641  call<F, NInt+1, NUint, NDouble, NString,
6642  black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
6643  }
6644  };
6645 
6646  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename ... Args1, typename ... Args2>
6647  struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<uint64_t, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
6648  {
6649  void operator()(F cparams)
6650  {
6651  using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<uint64_t, NUint>>;
6652  call<F, NInt, NUint+1, NDouble, NString,
6653  black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
6654  }
6655  };
6656 
6657  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename ... Args1, typename ... Args2>
6658  struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<double, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
6659  {
6660  void operator()(F cparams)
6661  {
6662  using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<double, NDouble>>;
6663  call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble+1, NString,
6664  black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
6665  }
6666  };
6667 
6668  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename ... Args1, typename ... Args2>
6669  struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<std::string, Args1...>, black_magic::S<Args2...>>
6670  {
6671  void operator()(F cparams)
6672  {
6673  using pushed = typename black_magic::S<Args2...>::template push_back<call_pair<std::string, NString>>;
6674  call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString+1,
6675  black_magic::S<Args1...>, pushed>()(cparams);
6676  }
6677  };
6678 
6679  template <typename F, int NInt, int NUint, int NDouble, int NString, typename ... Args1>
6680  struct call<F, NInt, NUint, NDouble, NString, black_magic::S<>, black_magic::S<Args1...>>
6681  {
6682  void operator()(F cparams)
6683  {
6684  cparams.handler(
6685  cparams.req,
6686  cparams.res,
6687  cparams.params.template get<typename Args1::type>(Args1::pos)...
6688  );
6689  }
6690  };
6691 
6692  template <typename Func, typename ... ArgsWrapped>
6693  struct Wrapped
6694  {
6695  template <typename ... Args>
6696  void set(Func f, typename std::enable_if<
6697  !std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value
6698  , int>::type = 0)
6699  {
6700  handler_ = (
6701 #ifdef CROW_CAN_USE_CPP14
6702  [f = std::move(f)]
6703 #else
6704  [f]
6705 #endif
6706  (const request&, response& res, Args... args){
6707  res = response(f(args...));
6708  res.end();
6709  });
6710  }
6711 
6712  template <typename Req, typename ... Args>
6713  struct req_handler_wrapper
6714  {
6715  req_handler_wrapper(Func f)
6716  : f(std::move(f))
6717  {
6718  }
6719 
6720  void operator()(const request& req, response& res, Args... args)
6721  {
6722  res = response(f(req, args...));
6723  res.end();
6724  }
6725 
6726  Func f;
6727  };
6728 
6729  template <typename ... Args>
6730  void set(Func f, typename std::enable_if<
6731  std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value &&
6732  !std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<1, std::tuple<Args..., void, void>>::type, response&>::value
6733  , int>::type = 0)
6734  {
6735  handler_ = req_handler_wrapper<Args...>(std::move(f));
6736  /*handler_ = (
6737  [f = std::move(f)]
6738  (const request& req, response& res, Args... args){
6739  res = response(f(req, args...));
6740  res.end();
6741  });*/
6742  }
6743 
6744  template <typename ... Args>
6745  void set(Func f, typename std::enable_if<
6746  std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<0, std::tuple<Args..., void>>::type, const request&>::value &&
6747  std::is_same<typename std::tuple_element<1, std::tuple<Args..., void, void>>::type, response&>::value
6748  , int>::type = 0)
6749  {
6750  handler_ = std::move(f);
6751  }
6752 
6753  template <typename ... Args>
6754  struct handler_type_helper
6755  {
6756  using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
6757  using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
6758  };
6759 
6760  template <typename ... Args>
6761  struct handler_type_helper<const request&, Args...>
6762  {
6763  using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
6764  using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
6765  };
6766 
6767  template <typename ... Args>
6768  struct handler_type_helper<const request&, response&, Args...>
6769  {
6770  using type = std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)>;
6771  using args_type = black_magic::S<typename black_magic::promote_t<Args>...>;
6772  };
6773 
6774  typename handler_type_helper<ArgsWrapped...>::type handler_;
6775 
6776  void operator()(const request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params)
6777  {
6778  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call<
6779  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
6780  decltype(handler_)>,
6781  0, 0, 0, 0,
6782  typename handler_type_helper<ArgsWrapped...>::args_type,
6783  black_magic::S<>
6784  >()(
6785  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
6786  decltype(handler_)>
6787  {handler_, params, req, res}
6788  );
6789  }
6790  };
6791 
6792  }
6793  }
6794 
6795  template <typename T>
6796  struct RuleParameterTraits
6797  {
6798  using self_t = T;
6799  self_t& name(std::string name) noexcept
6800  {
6801  ((self_t*)this)->name_ = std::move(name);
6802  return (self_t&)*this;
6803  }
6804 
6805  self_t& methods(HTTPMethod method)
6806  {
6807  ((self_t*)this)->methods_ = 1 << (int)method;
6808  return (self_t&)*this;
6809  }
6810 
6811  template <typename ... MethodArgs>
6812  self_t& methods(HTTPMethod method, MethodArgs ... args_method)
6813  {
6814  methods(args_method...);
6815  ((self_t*)this)->methods_ |= 1 << (int)method;
6816  return (self_t&)*this;
6817  }
6818  };
6819 
6820  class DynamicRule : public BaseRule, public RuleParameterTraits<DynamicRule>
6821  {
6822  public:
6823 
6824  DynamicRule(std::string rule)
6825  : BaseRule(std::move(rule))
6826  {
6827  }
6828 
6829  void validate() override
6830  {
6831  if (!erased_handler_)
6832  {
6833  throw std::runtime_error(name_ + (!name_.empty() ? ": " : "") + "no handler for url " + rule_);
6834  }
6835  }
6836 
6837  void handle(const request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params) override
6838  {
6839  erased_handler_(req, res, params);
6840  }
6841 
6842  template <typename Func>
6843  void operator()(Func f)
6844  {
6845 #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
6846  using function_t = utility::function_traits<decltype(&Func::operator())>;
6847 #else
6848  using function_t = utility::function_traits<Func>;
6849 #endif
6850  erased_handler_ = wrap(std::move(f), black_magic::gen_seq<function_t::arity>());
6851  }
6852 
6853  // enable_if Arg1 == request && Arg2 == response
6854  // enable_if Arg1 == request && Arg2 != resposne
6855  // enable_if Arg1 != request
6856 #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
6857  template <typename Func, size_t ... Indices>
6858 #else
6859  template <typename Func, unsigned ... Indices>
6860 #endif
6861  std::function<void(const request&, response&, const routing_params&)>
6862  wrap(Func f, black_magic::seq<Indices...>)
6863  {
6864 #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
6865  using function_t = utility::function_traits<decltype(&Func::operator())>;
6866 #else
6867  using function_t = utility::function_traits<Func>;
6868 #endif
6869  if (!black_magic::is_parameter_tag_compatible(
6870  black_magic::get_parameter_tag_runtime(rule_.c_str()),
6871  black_magic::compute_parameter_tag_from_args_list<
6872  typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...>::value))
6873  {
6874  throw std::runtime_error("route_dynamic: Handler type is mismatched with URL parameters: " + rule_);
6875  }
6876  auto ret = detail::routing_handler_call_helper::Wrapped<Func, typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...>();
6877  ret.template set<
6878  typename function_t::template arg<Indices>...
6879  >(std::move(f));
6880  return ret;
6881  }
6882 
6883  template <typename Func>
6884  void operator()(std::string name, Func&& f)
6885  {
6886  name_ = std::move(name);
6887  (*this).template operator()<Func>(std::forward(f));
6888  }
6889  private:
6890  std::function<void(const request&, response&, const routing_params&)> erased_handler_;
6891 
6892  };
6893 
6894  template <typename ... Args>
6895  class TaggedRule : public BaseRule, public RuleParameterTraits<TaggedRule<Args...>>
6896  {
6897  public:
6898  using self_t = TaggedRule<Args...>;
6899 
6900  TaggedRule(std::string rule)
6901  : BaseRule(std::move(rule))
6902  {
6903  }
6904 
6905  void validate()
6906  {
6907  if (!handler_)
6908  {
6909  throw std::runtime_error(name_ + (!name_.empty() ? ": " : "") + "no handler for url " + rule_);
6910  }
6911  }
6912 
6913  template <typename Func>
6914  typename std::enable_if<black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value, void>::type
6915  operator()(Func&& f)
6916  {
6917  static_assert(black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value ||
6918  black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, Args...>>::value ,
6919  "Handler type is mismatched with URL parameters");
6920  static_assert(!std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<Args>()...))>::value,
6921  "Handler function cannot have void return type; valid return types: string, int, crow::resposne, crow::json::wvalue");
6922 
6923  handler_ = [f = std::move(f)](const request&, response& res, Args ... args){
6924  res = response(f(args...));
6925  res.end();
6926  };
6927  }
6928 
6929  template <typename Func>
6930  typename std::enable_if<
6931  !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value &&
6932  black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, Args...>>::value,
6933  void>::type
6934  operator()(Func&& f)
6935  {
6936  static_assert(black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value ||
6937  black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, Args...>>::value,
6938  "Handler type is mismatched with URL parameters");
6939  static_assert(!std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<crow::request>(), std::declval<Args>()...))>::value,
6940  "Handler function cannot have void return type; valid return types: string, int, crow::resposne, crow::json::wvalue");
6941 
6942  handler_ = [f = std::move(f)](const crow::request& req, crow::response& res, Args ... args){
6943  res = response(f(req, args...));
6944  res.end();
6945  };
6946  }
6947 
6948  template <typename Func>
6949  typename std::enable_if<
6950  !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value &&
6951  !black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, Args...>>::value,
6952  void>::type
6953  operator()(Func&& f)
6954  {
6955  static_assert(black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<Args...>>::value ||
6956  black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, Args...>>::value ||
6957  black_magic::CallHelper<Func, black_magic::S<crow::request, crow::response&, Args...>>::value
6958  ,
6959  "Handler type is mismatched with URL parameters");
6960  static_assert(std::is_same<void, decltype(f(std::declval<crow::request>(), std::declval<crow::response&>(), std::declval<Args>()...))>::value,
6961  "Handler function with response argument should have void return type");
6962 
6963  handler_ = std::move(f);
6964  }
6965 
6966  template <typename Func>
6967  void operator()(std::string name, Func&& f)
6968  {
6969  name_ = std::move(name);
6970  (*this).template operator()<Func>(std::forward(f));
6971  }
6972 
6973  void handle(const request& req, response& res, const routing_params& params) override
6974  {
6975  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call<
6976  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
6977  decltype(handler_)>,
6978  0, 0, 0, 0,
6979  black_magic::S<Args...>,
6980  black_magic::S<>
6981  >()(
6982  detail::routing_handler_call_helper::call_params<
6983  decltype(handler_)>
6984  {handler_, params, req, res}
6985  );
6986  }
6987 
6988  private:
6989  std::function<void(const crow::request&, crow::response&, Args...)> handler_;
6990 
6991  };
6992 
6993  const int RULE_SPECIAL_REDIRECT_SLASH = 1;
6994 
6995  class Trie
6996  {
6997  public:
6998  struct Node
6999  {
7000  unsigned rule_index{};
7001  std::array<unsigned, (int)ParamType::MAX> param_childrens{};
7002  std::unordered_map<std::string, unsigned> children;
7003 
7004  bool IsSimpleNode() const
7005  {
7006  return
7007  !rule_index &&
7008  std::all_of(
7009  std::begin(param_childrens),
7010  std::end(param_childrens),
7011  [](unsigned x){ return !x; });
7012  }
7013  };
7014 
7015  Trie() : nodes_(1)
7016  {
7017  }
7018 
7019 private:
7020  void optimizeNode(Node* node)
7021  {
7022  for(auto x : node->param_childrens)
7023  {
7024  if (!x)
7025  continue;
7026  Node* child = &nodes_[x];
7027  optimizeNode(child);
7028  }
7029  if (node->children.empty())
7030  return;
7031  bool mergeWithChild = true;
7032  for(auto& kv : node->children)
7033  {
7034  Node* child = &nodes_[kv.second];
7035  if (!child->IsSimpleNode())
7036  {
7037  mergeWithChild = false;
7038  break;
7039  }
7040  }
7041  if (mergeWithChild)
7042  {
7043  decltype(node->children) merged;
7044  for(auto& kv : node->children)
7045  {
7046  Node* child = &nodes_[kv.second];
7047  for(auto& child_kv : child->children)
7048  {
7049  merged[kv.first + child_kv.first] = child_kv.second;
7050  }
7051  }
7052  node->children = std::move(merged);
7053  optimizeNode(node);
7054  }
7055  else
7056  {
7057  for(auto& kv : node->children)
7058  {
7059  Node* child = &nodes_[kv.second];
7060  optimizeNode(child);
7061  }
7062  }
7063  }
7064 
7065  void optimize()
7066  {
7067  optimizeNode(head());
7068  }
7069 
7070 public:
7071  void validate()
7072  {
7073  if (!head()->IsSimpleNode())
7074  throw std::runtime_error("Internal error: Trie header should be simple!");
7075  optimize();
7076  }
7077 
7078  std::pair<unsigned, routing_params> find(const std::string& req_url, const Node* node = nullptr, unsigned pos = 0, routing_params* params = nullptr) const
7079  {
7080  routing_params empty;
7081  if (params == nullptr)
7082  params = &empty;
7083 
7084  unsigned found{};
7085  routing_params match_params;
7086 
7087  if (node == nullptr)
7088  node = head();
7089  if (pos == req_url.size())
7090  return {node->rule_index, *params};
7091 
7092  auto update_found = [&found, &match_params](std::pair<unsigned, routing_params>& ret)
7093  {
7094  if (ret.first && (!found || found > ret.first))
7095  {
7096  found = ret.first;
7097  match_params = std::move(ret.second);
7098  }
7099  };
7100 
7101  if (node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::INT])
7102  {
7103  char c = req_url[pos];
7104  if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+' || c == '-')
7105  {
7106  char* eptr;
7107  errno = 0;
7108  long long int value = strtoll(req_url.data()+pos, &eptr, 10);
7109  if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data()+pos)
7110  {
7111  params->int_params.push_back(value);
7112  auto ret = find(req_url, &nodes_[node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::INT]], eptr - req_url.data(), params);
7113  update_found(ret);
7114  params->int_params.pop_back();
7115  }
7116  }
7117  }
7118 
7119  if (node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::UINT])
7120  {
7121  char c = req_url[pos];
7122  if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+')
7123  {
7124  char* eptr;
7125  errno = 0;
7126  unsigned long long int value = strtoull(req_url.data()+pos, &eptr, 10);
7127  if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data()+pos)
7128  {
7129  params->uint_params.push_back(value);
7130  auto ret = find(req_url, &nodes_[node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::UINT]], eptr - req_url.data(), params);
7131  update_found(ret);
7132  params->uint_params.pop_back();
7133  }
7134  }
7135  }
7136 
7137  if (node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::DOUBLE])
7138  {
7139  char c = req_url[pos];
7140  if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '+' || c == '-' || c == '.')
7141  {
7142  char* eptr;
7143  errno = 0;
7144  double value = strtod(req_url.data()+pos, &eptr);
7145  if (errno != ERANGE && eptr != req_url.data()+pos)
7146  {
7147  params->double_params.push_back(value);
7148  auto ret = find(req_url, &nodes_[node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::DOUBLE]], eptr - req_url.data(), params);
7149  update_found(ret);
7150  params->double_params.pop_back();
7151  }
7152  }
7153  }
7154 
7155  if (node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::STRING])
7156  {
7157  size_t epos = pos;
7158  for(; epos < req_url.size(); epos ++)
7159  {
7160  if (req_url[epos] == '/')
7161  break;
7162  }
7163 
7164  if (epos != pos)
7165  {
7166  params->string_params.push_back(req_url.substr(pos, epos-pos));
7167  auto ret = find(req_url, &nodes_[node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::STRING]], epos, params);
7168  update_found(ret);
7169  params->string_params.pop_back();
7170  }
7171  }
7172 
7173  if (node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::PATH])
7174  {
7175  size_t epos = req_url.size();
7176 
7177  if (epos != pos)
7178  {
7179  params->string_params.push_back(req_url.substr(pos, epos-pos));
7180  auto ret = find(req_url, &nodes_[node->param_childrens[(int)ParamType::PATH]], epos, params);
7181  update_found(ret);
7182  params->string_params.pop_back();
7183  }
7184  }
7185 
7186  for(auto& kv : node->children)
7187  {
7188  const std::string& fragment = kv.first;
7189  const Node* child = &nodes_[kv.second];
7190 
7191  if (req_url.compare(pos, fragment.size(), fragment) == 0)
7192  {
7193  auto ret = find(req_url, child, pos + fragment.size(), params);
7194  update_found(ret);
7195  }
7196  }
7197 
7198  return {found, match_params};
7199  }
7200 
7201  void add(const std::string& url, unsigned rule_index)
7202  {
7203  unsigned idx{0};
7204 
7205  for(unsigned i = 0; i < url.size(); i ++)
7206  {
7207  char c = url[i];
7208  if (c == '<')
7209  {
7210  static struct ParamTraits
7211  {
7212  ParamType type;
7213  std::string name;
7214  } paramTraits[] =
7215  {
7216  { ParamType::INT, "<int>" },
7217  { ParamType::UINT, "<uint>" },
7218  { ParamType::DOUBLE, "<float>" },
7219  { ParamType::DOUBLE, "<double>" },
7220  { ParamType::STRING, "<str>" },
7221  { ParamType::STRING, "<string>" },
7222  { ParamType::PATH, "<path>" },
7223  };
7224 
7225  for(auto& x:paramTraits)
7226  {
7227  if (url.compare(i, x.name.size(), x.name) == 0)
7228  {
7229  if (!nodes_[idx].param_childrens[(int)x.type])
7230  {
7231  auto new_node_idx = new_node();
7232  nodes_[idx].param_childrens[(int)x.type] = new_node_idx;
7233  }
7234  idx = nodes_[idx].param_childrens[(int)x.type];
7235  i += x.name.size();
7236  break;
7237  }
7238  }
7239 
7240  i --;
7241  }
7242  else
7243  {
7244  std::string piece(&c, 1);
7245  if (!nodes_[idx].children.count(piece))
7246  {
7247  auto new_node_idx = new_node();
7248  nodes_[idx].children.emplace(piece, new_node_idx);
7249  }
7250  idx = nodes_[idx].children[piece];
7251  }
7252  }
7253  if (nodes_[idx].rule_index)
7254  throw std::runtime_error("handler already exists for " + url);
7255  nodes_[idx].rule_index = rule_index;
7256  }
7257  private:
7258  void debug_node_print(Node* n, int level)
7259  {
7260  for(int i = 0; i < (int)ParamType::MAX; i ++)
7261  {
7262  if (n->param_childrens[i])
7263  {
7264  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(2*level, ' ') /*<< "("<<n->param_childrens[i]<<") "*/;
7265  switch((ParamType)i)
7266  {
7267  case ParamType::INT:
7268  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<int>";
7269  break;
7270  case ParamType::UINT:
7271  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<uint>";
7272  break;
7273  case ParamType::DOUBLE:
7274  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<float>";
7275  break;
7276  case ParamType::STRING:
7277  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<str>";
7278  break;
7279  case ParamType::PATH:
7280  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<path>";
7281  break;
7282  default:
7283  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "<ERROR>";
7284  break;
7285  }
7286 
7287  debug_node_print(&nodes_[n->param_childrens[i]], level+1);
7288  }
7289  }
7290  for(auto& kv : n->children)
7291  {
7292  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << std::string(2*level, ' ') /*<< "(" << kv.second << ") "*/ << kv.first;
7293  debug_node_print(&nodes_[kv.second], level+1);
7294  }
7295  }
7296 
7297  public:
7298  void debug_print()
7299  {
7300  debug_node_print(head(), 0);
7301  }
7302 
7303  private:
7304  const Node* head() const
7305  {
7306  return &nodes_.front();
7307  }
7308 
7309  Node* head()
7310  {
7311  return &nodes_.front();
7312  }
7313 
7314  unsigned new_node()
7315  {
7316  nodes_.resize(nodes_.size()+1);
7317  return nodes_.size() - 1;
7318  }
7319 
7320  std::vector<Node> nodes_;
7321  };
7322 
7323  class Router
7324  {
7325  public:
7326  Router() : rules_(2)
7327  {
7328  }
7329 
7330  DynamicRule& new_rule_dynamic(const std::string& rule)
7331  {
7332  auto ruleObject = new DynamicRule(rule);
7333 
7334  internal_add_rule_object(rule, ruleObject);
7335 
7336  return *ruleObject;
7337  }
7338 
7339  template <uint64_t N>
7340  typename black_magic::arguments<N>::type::template rebind<TaggedRule>& new_rule_tagged(const std::string& rule)
7341  {
7342  using RuleT = typename black_magic::arguments<N>::type::template rebind<TaggedRule>;
7343  auto ruleObject = new RuleT(rule);
7344 
7345  internal_add_rule_object(rule, ruleObject);
7346 
7347  return *ruleObject;
7348  }
7349 
7350  void internal_add_rule_object(const std::string& rule, BaseRule* ruleObject)
7351  {
7352  rules_.emplace_back(ruleObject);
7353  trie_.add(rule, rules_.size() - 1);
7354 
7355  // directory case:
7356  // request to `/about' url matches `/about/' rule
7357  if (rule.size() > 1 && rule.back() == '/')
7358  {
7359  std::string rule_without_trailing_slash = rule;
7360  rule_without_trailing_slash.pop_back();
7361  trie_.add(rule_without_trailing_slash, RULE_SPECIAL_REDIRECT_SLASH);
7362  }
7363  }
7364 
7365  void validate()
7366  {
7367  trie_.validate();
7368  for(auto& rule:rules_)
7369  {
7370  if (rule)
7371  rule->validate();
7372  }
7373  }
7374 
7375  void handle(const request& req, response& res)
7376  {
7377  auto found = trie_.find(req.url);
7378 
7379  unsigned rule_index = found.first;
7380  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "???" << rule_index;
7381 
7382  if (!rule_index)
7383  {
7384  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Cannot match rules " << req.url;
7385  res = response(404);
7386  res.end();
7387  return;
7388  }
7389 
7390  if (rule_index >= rules_.size())
7391  throw std::runtime_error("Trie internal structure corrupted!");
7392 
7393  if (rule_index == RULE_SPECIAL_REDIRECT_SLASH)
7394  {
7395  CROW_LOG_INFO << "Redirecting to a url with trailing slash: " << req.url;
7396  res = response(301);
7397 
7398  // TODO absolute url building
7399  if (req.get_header_value("Host").empty())
7400  {
7401  res.add_header("Location", req.url + "/");
7402  }
7403  else
7404  {
7405  res.add_header("Location", "http://" + req.get_header_value("Host") + req.url + "/");
7406  }
7407  res.end();
7408  return;
7409  }
7410 
7411  if ((rules_[rule_index]->get_methods() & (1<<(uint32_t)req.method)) == 0)
7412  {
7413  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Rule found but method mismatch: " << req.url << " with " << method_name(req.method) << "(" << (uint32_t)req.method << ") / " << rules_[rule_index]->get_methods();
7414  res = response(404);
7415  res.end();
7416  return;
7417  }
7418 
7419  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Matched rule '" << rules_[rule_index]->rule_ << "' " << (uint32_t)req.method << " / " << rules_[rule_index]->get_methods();
7420 
7421  // any uncaught exceptions become 500s
7422  try
7423  {
7424  rules_[rule_index]->handle(req, res, found.second);
7425  }
7426  catch(std::exception& e)
7427  {
7428  CROW_LOG_ERROR << "An uncaught exception occurred: " << e.what();
7429  res = response(500);
7430  res.end();
7431  return;
7432  }
7433  catch(...)
7434  {
7435  CROW_LOG_ERROR << "An uncaught exception occurred. The type was unknown so no information was available.";
7436  res = response(500);
7437  res.end();
7438  return;
7439  }
7440  }
7441 
7442  void debug_print()
7443  {
7444  trie_.debug_print();
7445  }
7446 
7447  private:
7448  std::vector<std::unique_ptr<BaseRule>> rules_;
7449  Trie trie_;
7450  };
7451 }
7452 
7453 
7454 
7455 #pragma once
7456 
7457 
7458 
7459 
7460 
7461 
7462 
7463 
7464 namespace crow
7465 {
7466  namespace detail
7467  {
7468  template <typename ... Middlewares>
7469  struct partial_context
7470  : public black_magic::pop_back<Middlewares...>::template rebind<partial_context>
7471  , public black_magic::last_element_type<Middlewares...>::type::context
7472  {
7473  using parent_context = typename black_magic::pop_back<Middlewares...>::template rebind<::crow::detail::partial_context>;
7474  template <int N>
7475  using partial = typename std::conditional<N == sizeof...(Middlewares)-1, partial_context, typename parent_context::template partial<N>>::type;
7476 
7477  template <typename T>
7478  typename T::context& get()
7479  {
7480  return static_cast<typename T::context&>(*this);
7481  }
7482  };
7483 
7484  template <>
7485  struct partial_context<>
7486  {
7487  template <int>
7488  using partial = partial_context;
7489  };
7490 
7491  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container, typename CurrentMW, typename ... Middlewares>
7492  bool middleware_call_helper(Container& middlewares, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx);
7493 
7494  template <typename ... Middlewares>
7495  struct context : private partial_context<Middlewares...>
7496  //struct context : private Middlewares::context... // simple but less type-safe
7497  {
7498  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7499  friend typename std::enable_if<(N==0)>::type after_handlers_call_helper(Container& middlewares, Context& ctx, request& req, response& res);
7500  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7501  friend typename std::enable_if<(N>0)>::type after_handlers_call_helper(Container& middlewares, Context& ctx, request& req, response& res);
7502 
7503  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container, typename CurrentMW, typename ... Middlewares2>
7504  friend bool middleware_call_helper(Container& middlewares, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx);
7505 
7506  template <typename T>
7507  typename T::context& get()
7508  {
7509  return static_cast<typename T::context&>(*this);
7510  }
7511 
7512  template <int N>
7513  using partial = typename partial_context<Middlewares...>::template partial<N>;
7514  };
7515  }
7516 }
7517 
7518 
7519 
7520 #pragma once
7521 #include <boost/asio.hpp>
7522 #include <boost/algorithm/string/predicate.hpp>
7523 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
7524 #include <boost/array.hpp>
7525 #include <atomic>
7526 #include <chrono>
7527 #include <vector>
7528 
7529 
7530 
7531 
7532 
7533 
7534 
7535 
7536 
7537 
7538 
7539 
7540 
7541 
7542 
7543 
7544 
7545 
7546 
7547 namespace crow
7548 {
7549  using namespace boost;
7550  using tcp = asio::ip::tcp;
7551 
7552  namespace detail
7553  {
7554  template <typename MW>
7555  struct check_before_handle_arity_3_const
7556  {
7557  template <typename T,
7558  void (T::*)(request&, response&, typename MW::context&) const = &T::before_handle
7559  >
7560  struct get
7561  { };
7562  };
7563 
7564  template <typename MW>
7565  struct check_before_handle_arity_3
7566  {
7567  template <typename T,
7568  void (T::*)(request&, response&, typename MW::context&) = &T::before_handle
7569  >
7570  struct get
7571  { };
7572  };
7573 
7574  template <typename MW>
7575  struct check_after_handle_arity_3_const
7576  {
7577  template <typename T,
7578  void (T::*)(request&, response&, typename MW::context&) const = &T::after_handle
7579  >
7580  struct get
7581  { };
7582  };
7583 
7584  template <typename MW>
7585  struct check_after_handle_arity_3
7586  {
7587  template <typename T,
7588  void (T::*)(request&, response&, typename MW::context&) = &T::after_handle
7589  >
7590  struct get
7591  { };
7592  };
7593 
7594  template <typename T>
7595  struct is_before_handle_arity_3_impl
7596  {
7597  template <typename C>
7598  static std::true_type f(typename check_before_handle_arity_3_const<T>::template get<C>*);
7599 
7600  template <typename C>
7601  static std::true_type f(typename check_before_handle_arity_3<T>::template get<C>*);
7602 
7603  template <typename C>
7604  static std::false_type f(...);
7605 
7606  public:
7607  static const bool value = decltype(f<T>(nullptr))::value;
7608  };
7609 
7610  template <typename T>
7611  struct is_after_handle_arity_3_impl
7612  {
7613  template <typename C>
7614  static std::true_type f(typename check_after_handle_arity_3_const<T>::template get<C>*);
7615 
7616  template <typename C>
7617  static std::true_type f(typename check_after_handle_arity_3<T>::template get<C>*);
7618 
7619  template <typename C>
7620  static std::false_type f(...);
7621 
7622  public:
7623  static const bool value = decltype(f<T>(nullptr))::value;
7624  };
7625 
7626  template <typename MW, typename Context, typename ParentContext>
7627  typename std::enable_if<!is_before_handle_arity_3_impl<MW>::value>::type
7628  before_handler_call(MW& mw, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx, ParentContext& parent_ctx)
7629  {
7630  mw.before_handle(req, res, ctx.template get<MW>(), ctx);
7631  }
7632 
7633  template <typename MW, typename Context, typename ParentContext>
7634  typename std::enable_if<is_before_handle_arity_3_impl<MW>::value>::type
7635  before_handler_call(MW& mw, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx, ParentContext& parent_ctx)
7636  {
7637  mw.before_handle(req, res, ctx.template get<MW>());
7638  }
7639 
7640  template <typename MW, typename Context, typename ParentContext>
7641  typename std::enable_if<!is_after_handle_arity_3_impl<MW>::value>::type
7642  after_handler_call(MW& mw, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx, ParentContext& parent_ctx)
7643  {
7644  mw.after_handle(req, res, ctx.template get<MW>(), ctx);
7645  }
7646 
7647  template <typename MW, typename Context, typename ParentContext>
7648  typename std::enable_if<is_after_handle_arity_3_impl<MW>::value>::type
7649  after_handler_call(MW& mw, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx, ParentContext& parent_ctx)
7650  {
7651  mw.after_handle(req, res, ctx.template get<MW>());
7652  }
7653 
7654  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container, typename CurrentMW, typename ... Middlewares>
7655  bool middleware_call_helper(Container& middlewares, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx)
7656  {
7657  using parent_context_t = typename Context::template partial<N-1>;
7658  before_handler_call<CurrentMW, Context, parent_context_t>(std::get<N>(middlewares), req, res, ctx, static_cast<parent_context_t&>(ctx));
7659 
7660  if (res.is_completed())
7661  {
7662  after_handler_call<CurrentMW, Context, parent_context_t>(std::get<N>(middlewares), req, res, ctx, static_cast<parent_context_t&>(ctx));
7663  return true;
7664  }
7665 
7666  if (middleware_call_helper<N+1, Context, Container, Middlewares...>(middlewares, req, res, ctx))
7667  {
7668  after_handler_call<CurrentMW, Context, parent_context_t>(std::get<N>(middlewares), req, res, ctx, static_cast<parent_context_t&>(ctx));
7669  return true;
7670  }
7671 
7672  return false;
7673  }
7674 
7675  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7676  bool middleware_call_helper(Container& middlewares, request& req, response& res, Context& ctx)
7677  {
7678  return false;
7679  }
7680 
7681  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7682  typename std::enable_if<(N<0)>::type
7683  after_handlers_call_helper(Container& middlewares, Context& context, request& req, response& res)
7684  {
7685  }
7686 
7687  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7688  typename std::enable_if<(N==0)>::type after_handlers_call_helper(Container& middlewares, Context& ctx, request& req, response& res)
7689  {
7690  using parent_context_t = typename Context::template partial<N-1>;
7691  using CurrentMW = typename std::tuple_element<N, typename std::remove_reference<Container>::type>::type;
7692  after_handler_call<CurrentMW, Context, parent_context_t>(std::get<N>(middlewares), req, res, ctx, static_cast<parent_context_t&>(ctx));
7693  }
7694 
7695  template <int N, typename Context, typename Container>
7696  typename std::enable_if<(N>0)>::type after_handlers_call_helper(Container& middlewares, Context& ctx, request& req, response& res)
7697  {
7698  using parent_context_t = typename Context::template partial<N-1>;
7699  using CurrentMW = typename std::tuple_element<N, typename std::remove_reference<Container>::type>::type;
7700  after_handler_call<CurrentMW, Context, parent_context_t>(std::get<N>(middlewares), req, res, ctx, static_cast<parent_context_t&>(ctx));
7701  after_handlers_call_helper<N-1, Context, Container>(middlewares, ctx, req, res);
7702  }
7703  }
7704 
7705 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_DEBUG
7706  static int connectionCount;
7707 #endif
7708  template <typename Adaptor, typename Handler, typename ... Middlewares>
7709  class Connection
7710  {
7711  public:
7712  Connection(
7713  boost::asio::io_service& io_service,
7714  Handler* handler,
7715  const std::string& server_name,
7716  std::tuple<Middlewares...>* middlewares,
7717  std::function<std::string()>& get_cached_date_str_f,
7718  detail::dumb_timer_queue& timer_queue,
7719  typename Adaptor::context* adaptor_ctx_
7720  )
7721  : adaptor_(io_service, adaptor_ctx_),
7722  handler_(handler),
7723  parser_(this),
7724  server_name_(server_name),
7725  middlewares_(middlewares),
7726  get_cached_date_str(get_cached_date_str_f),
7727  timer_queue(timer_queue)
7728  {
7729 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_DEBUG
7730  connectionCount ++;
7731  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Connection open, total " << connectionCount << ", " << this;
7732 #endif
7733  }
7734 
7735  ~Connection()
7736  {
7737  res.complete_request_handler_ = nullptr;
7738  cancel_deadline_timer();
7739 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_DEBUG
7740  connectionCount --;
7741  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Connection closed, total " << connectionCount << ", " << this;
7742 #endif
7743  }
7744 
7745  decltype(std::declval<Adaptor>().raw_socket())& socket()
7746  {
7747  return adaptor_.raw_socket();
7748  }
7749 
7750  void start()
7751  {
7752  adaptor_.start([this](const boost::system::error_code& ec) {
7753  if (!ec)
7754  {
7755  start_deadline();
7756 
7757  do_read();
7758  }
7759  else
7760  {
7761  check_destroy();
7762  }
7763  });
7764  }
7765 
7766  void handle_header()
7767  {
7768  // HTTP 1.1 Expect: 100-continue
7769  if (parser_.check_version(1, 1) && parser_.headers.count("expect") && get_header_value(parser_.headers, "expect") == "100-continue")
7770  {
7771  buffers_.clear();
7772  static std::string expect_100_continue = "HTTP/1.1 100 Continue\r\n\r\n";
7773  buffers_.emplace_back(expect_100_continue.data(), expect_100_continue.size());
7774  do_write();
7775  }
7776  }
7777 
7778  void handle()
7779  {
7780  cancel_deadline_timer();
7781  bool is_invalid_request = false;
7782  add_keep_alive_ = false;
7783 
7784  req_ = std::move(parser_.to_request());
7785  request& req = req_;
7786  if (parser_.check_version(1, 0))
7787  {
7788  // HTTP/1.0
7789  if (req.headers.count("connection"))
7790  {
7791  if (boost::iequals(req.get_header_value("connection"),"Keep-Alive"))
7792  add_keep_alive_ = true;
7793  }
7794  else
7795  close_connection_ = true;
7796  }
7797  else if (parser_.check_version(1, 1))
7798  {
7799  // HTTP/1.1
7800  if (req.headers.count("connection"))
7801  {
7802  if (req.get_header_value("connection") == "close")
7803  close_connection_ = true;
7804  else if (boost::iequals(req.get_header_value("connection"),"Keep-Alive"))
7805  add_keep_alive_ = true;
7806  }
7807  if (!req.headers.count("host"))
7808  {
7809  is_invalid_request = true;
7810  res = response(400);
7811  }
7812  }
7813 
7814  CROW_LOG_INFO << "Request: " << boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(adaptor_.remote_endpoint()) << " " << this << " HTTP/" << parser_.http_major << "." << parser_.http_minor << ' '
7815  << method_name(req.method) << " " << req.url;
7816 
7817 
7818  need_to_call_after_handlers_ = false;
7819  if (!is_invalid_request)
7820  {
7821  res.complete_request_handler_ = []{};
7822  res.is_alive_helper_ = [this]()->bool{ return adaptor_.is_open(); };
7823 
7824  ctx_ = detail::context<Middlewares...>();
7825  req.middleware_context = (void*)&ctx_;
7826  detail::middleware_call_helper<0, decltype(ctx_), decltype(*middlewares_), Middlewares...>(*middlewares_, req, res, ctx_);
7827 
7828  if (!res.completed_)
7829  {
7830  res.complete_request_handler_ = [this]{ this->complete_request(); };
7831  need_to_call_after_handlers_ = true;
7832  handler_->handle(req, res);
7833  if (add_keep_alive_)
7834  res.set_header("connection", "Keep-Alive");
7835  }
7836  else
7837  {
7838  complete_request();
7839  }
7840  }
7841  else
7842  {
7843  complete_request();
7844  }
7845  }
7846 
7847  void complete_request()
7848  {
7849  CROW_LOG_INFO << "Response: " << this << ' ' << req_.raw_url << ' ' << res.code << ' ' << close_connection_;
7850 
7851  if (need_to_call_after_handlers_)
7852  {
7853  need_to_call_after_handlers_ = false;
7854 
7855  // call all after_handler of middlewares
7856  detail::after_handlers_call_helper<
7857  ((int)sizeof...(Middlewares)-1),
7858  decltype(ctx_),
7859  decltype(*middlewares_)>
7860  (*middlewares_, ctx_, req_, res);
7861  }
7862 
7863  //auto self = this->shared_from_this();
7864  res.complete_request_handler_ = nullptr;
7865 
7866  if (!adaptor_.is_open())
7867  {
7868  //CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " delete (socket is closed) " << is_reading << ' ' << is_writing;
7869  //delete this;
7870  return;
7871  }
7872 
7873  static std::unordered_map<int, std::string> statusCodes = {
7874  {200, "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n"},
7875  {201, "HTTP/1.1 201 Created\r\n"},
7876  {202, "HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted\r\n"},
7877  {204, "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n"},
7878 
7879  {300, "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n"},
7880  {301, "HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently\r\n"},
7881  {302, "HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily\r\n"},
7882  {304, "HTTP/1.1 304 Not Modified\r\n"},
7883 
7884  {400, "HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request\r\n"},
7885  {401, "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized\r\n"},
7886  {403, "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n"},
7887  {404, "HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found\r\n"},
7888 
7889  {500, "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n"},
7890  {501, "HTTP/1.1 501 Not Implemented\r\n"},
7891  {502, "HTTP/1.1 502 Bad Gateway\r\n"},
7892  {503, "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n"},
7893  };
7894 
7895  static std::string seperator = ": ";
7896  static std::string crlf = "\r\n";
7897 
7898  buffers_.clear();
7899  buffers_.reserve(4*(res.headers.size()+5)+3);
7900 
7901  if (res.body.empty() && res.json_value.t() == json::type::Object)
7902  {
7903  res.body = json::dump(res.json_value);
7904  }
7905 
7906  if (!statusCodes.count(res.code))
7907  res.code = 500;
7908  {
7909  auto& status = statusCodes.find(res.code)->second;
7910  buffers_.emplace_back(status.data(), status.size());
7911  }
7912 
7913  if (res.code >= 400 && res.body.empty())
7914  res.body = statusCodes[res.code].substr(9);
7915 
7916  for(auto& kv : res.headers)
7917  {
7918  buffers_.emplace_back(kv.first.data(), kv.first.size());
7919  buffers_.emplace_back(seperator.data(), seperator.size());
7920  buffers_.emplace_back(kv.second.data(), kv.second.size());
7921  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7922 
7923  }
7924 
7925  if (!res.headers.count("content-length"))
7926  {
7927  content_length_ = std::to_string(res.body.size());
7928  static std::string content_length_tag = "Content-Length: ";
7929  buffers_.emplace_back(content_length_tag.data(), content_length_tag.size());
7930  buffers_.emplace_back(content_length_.data(), content_length_.size());
7931  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7932  }
7933  if (!res.headers.count("server"))
7934  {
7935  static std::string server_tag = "Server: ";
7936  buffers_.emplace_back(server_tag.data(), server_tag.size());
7937  buffers_.emplace_back(server_name_.data(), server_name_.size());
7938  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7939  }
7940  if (!res.headers.count("date"))
7941  {
7942  static std::string date_tag = "Date: ";
7943  date_str_ = get_cached_date_str();
7944  buffers_.emplace_back(date_tag.data(), date_tag.size());
7945  buffers_.emplace_back(date_str_.data(), date_str_.size());
7946  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7947  }
7948  if (add_keep_alive_)
7949  {
7950  static std::string keep_alive_tag = "Connection: Keep-Alive";
7951  buffers_.emplace_back(keep_alive_tag.data(), keep_alive_tag.size());
7952  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7953  }
7954 
7955  buffers_.emplace_back(crlf.data(), crlf.size());
7956  res_body_copy_.swap(res.body);
7957  buffers_.emplace_back(res_body_copy_.data(), res_body_copy_.size());
7958 
7959  do_write();
7960 
7961  if (need_to_start_read_after_complete_)
7962  {
7963  need_to_start_read_after_complete_ = false;
7964  start_deadline();
7965  do_read();
7966  }
7967  }
7968 
7969  private:
7970  void do_read()
7971  {
7972  //auto self = this->shared_from_this();
7973  is_reading = true;
7974  adaptor_.socket().async_read_some(boost::asio::buffer(buffer_),
7975  [this](const boost::system::error_code& ec, std::size_t bytes_transferred)
7976  {
7977  bool error_while_reading = true;
7978  if (!ec)
7979  {
7980  bool ret = parser_.feed(buffer_.data(), bytes_transferred);
7981  if (ret && adaptor_.is_open() && !close_connection_)
7982  {
7983  error_while_reading = false;
7984  }
7985  }
7986 
7987  if (error_while_reading)
7988  {
7989  cancel_deadline_timer();
7990  parser_.done();
7991  adaptor_.close();
7992  is_reading = false;
7993  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " from read(1)";
7994  check_destroy();
7995  }
7996  else if (!need_to_call_after_handlers_)
7997  {
7998  start_deadline();
7999  do_read();
8000  }
8001  else
8002  {
8003  // res will be completed later by user
8004  need_to_start_read_after_complete_ = true;
8005  }
8006  });
8007  }
8008 
8009  void do_write()
8010  {
8011  //auto self = this->shared_from_this();
8012  is_writing = true;
8013  boost::asio::async_write(adaptor_.socket(), buffers_,
8014  [&](const boost::system::error_code& ec, std::size_t bytes_transferred)
8015  {
8016  is_writing = false;
8017  res.clear();
8018  res_body_copy_.clear();
8019  if (!ec)
8020  {
8021  if (close_connection_)
8022  {
8023  adaptor_.close();
8024  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " from write(1)";
8025  check_destroy();
8026  }
8027  }
8028  else
8029  {
8030  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " from write(2)";
8031  check_destroy();
8032  }
8033  });
8034  }
8035 
8036  void check_destroy()
8037  {
8038  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " is_reading " << is_reading << " is_writing " << is_writing;
8039  if (!is_reading && !is_writing)
8040  {
8041  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " delete (idle) ";
8042  delete this;
8043  }
8044  }
8045 
8046  void cancel_deadline_timer()
8047  {
8048  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " timer cancelled: " << timer_cancel_key_.first << ' ' << timer_cancel_key_.second;
8049  timer_queue.cancel(timer_cancel_key_);
8050  }
8051 
8052  void start_deadline(int timeout = 5)
8053  {
8054  cancel_deadline_timer();
8055 
8056  timer_cancel_key_ = timer_queue.add([this]
8057  {
8058  if (!adaptor_.is_open())
8059  {
8060  return;
8061  }
8062  adaptor_.close();
8063  });
8064  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << this << " timer added: " << timer_cancel_key_.first << ' ' << timer_cancel_key_.second;
8065  }
8066 
8067  private:
8068  Adaptor adaptor_;
8069  Handler* handler_;
8070 
8071  boost::array<char, 4096> buffer_;
8072 
8073  HTTPParser<Connection> parser_;
8074  request req_;
8075  response res;
8076 
8077  bool close_connection_ = false;
8078 
8079  const std::string& server_name_;
8080  std::vector<boost::asio::const_buffer> buffers_;
8081 
8082  std::string content_length_;
8083  std::string date_str_;
8084  std::string res_body_copy_;
8085 
8086  //boost::asio::deadline_timer deadline_;
8087  detail::dumb_timer_queue::key timer_cancel_key_;
8088 
8089  bool is_reading{};
8090  bool is_writing{};
8091  bool need_to_call_after_handlers_{};
8092  bool need_to_start_read_after_complete_{};
8093  bool add_keep_alive_{};
8094 
8095  std::tuple<Middlewares...>* middlewares_;
8096  detail::context<Middlewares...> ctx_;
8097 
8098  std::function<std::string()>& get_cached_date_str;
8099  detail::dumb_timer_queue& timer_queue;
8100  };
8101 
8102 }
8103 
8104 
8105 
8106 #pragma once
8107 
8108 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
8109 #include <boost/asio.hpp>
8110 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8111 #include <boost/asio/ssl.hpp>
8112 #endif
8113 #include <cstdint>
8114 #include <atomic>
8115 #include <future>
8116 #include <vector>
8117 
8118 #include <memory>
8119 
8120 
8121 
8122 
8123 
8124 
8125 
8126 
8127 namespace crow
8128 {
8129  using namespace boost;
8130  using tcp = asio::ip::tcp;
8131 
8132  template <typename Handler, typename Adaptor = SocketAdaptor, typename ... Middlewares>
8133  class Server
8134  {
8135  public:
8136  Server(Handler* handler, std::string bindaddr, uint16_t port, std::tuple<Middlewares...>* middlewares = nullptr, uint16_t concurrency = 1, typename Adaptor::context* adaptor_ctx = nullptr)
8137  : acceptor_(io_service_, tcp::endpoint(boost::asio::ip::address::from_string(bindaddr), port)),
8138  signals_(io_service_, SIGINT, SIGTERM),
8139  handler_(handler),
8140  concurrency_(concurrency),
8141  port_(port),
8142  bindaddr_(bindaddr),
8143  middlewares_(middlewares),
8144  adaptor_ctx_(adaptor_ctx)
8145  {
8146  }
8147 
8148  void run()
8149  {
8150  if (concurrency_ < 0)
8151  concurrency_ = 1;
8152 
8153  for(int i = 0; i < concurrency_; i++)
8154  io_service_pool_.emplace_back(new boost::asio::io_service());
8155  get_cached_date_str_pool_.resize(concurrency_);
8156  timer_queue_pool_.resize(concurrency_);
8157 
8158  std::vector<std::future<void>> v;
8159  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < concurrency_; i ++)
8160  v.push_back(
8161  std::async(std::launch::async, [this, i]{
8162 
8163  // thread local date string get function
8164  auto last = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
8165 
8166  std::string date_str;
8167  auto update_date_str = [&]
8168  {
8169  auto last_time_t = time(0);
8170  tm my_tm;
8171 
8172 #ifdef _MSC_VER
8173  gmtime_s(&my_tm, &last_time_t);
8174 #else
8175  gmtime_r(&last_time_t, &my_tm);
8176 #endif
8177  date_str.resize(100);
8178  size_t date_str_sz = strftime(&date_str[0], 99, "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S GMT", &my_tm);
8179  date_str.resize(date_str_sz);
8180  };
8181  update_date_str();
8182  get_cached_date_str_pool_[i] = [&]()->std::string
8183  {
8184  if (std::chrono::steady_clock::now() - last >= std::chrono::seconds(1))
8185  {
8186  last = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
8187  update_date_str();
