8188  }
8189  return date_str;
8190  };
8191 
8192  // initializing timer queue
8193  detail::dumb_timer_queue timer_queue;
8194  timer_queue_pool_[i] = &timer_queue;
8195 
8196  timer_queue.set_io_service(*io_service_pool_[i]);
8197  boost::asio::deadline_timer timer(*io_service_pool_[i]);
8198  timer.expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(1));
8199 
8200  std::function<void(const boost::system::error_code& ec)> handler;
8201  handler = [&](const boost::system::error_code& ec){
8202  if (ec)
8203  return;
8204  timer_queue.process();
8205  timer.expires_from_now(boost::posix_time::seconds(1));
8206  timer.async_wait(handler);
8207  };
8208  timer.async_wait(handler);
8209 
8210  io_service_pool_[i]->run();
8211  }));
8212  CROW_LOG_INFO << server_name_ << " server is running, local port " << port_;
8213 
8214  signals_.async_wait(
8215  [&](const boost::system::error_code& error, int signal_number){
8216  stop();
8217  });
8218 
8219  for (int i = 0; i < concurrency_; i++)
8220  {
8221  while (timer_queue_pool_[i] == nullptr)
8222  std::this_thread::yield();
8223  }
8224 
8225  do_accept();
8226 
8227  std::thread([this]{
8228  io_service_.run();
8229  CROW_LOG_INFO << "Exiting.";
8230  }).join();
8231  }
8232 
8233  void stop()
8234  {
8235  io_service_.stop();
8236  for(auto& io_service:io_service_pool_)
8237  io_service->stop();
8238  }
8239 
8240  private:
8241  asio::io_service& pick_io_service()
8242  {
8243  // TODO load balancing
8244  roundrobin_index_++;
8245  if (roundrobin_index_ >= io_service_pool_.size())
8246  roundrobin_index_ = 0;
8247  return *io_service_pool_[roundrobin_index_];
8248  }
8249 
8250  void do_accept()
8251  {
8252  asio::io_service& is = pick_io_service();
8253  auto p = new Connection<Adaptor, Handler, Middlewares...>(
8254  is, handler_, server_name_, middlewares_,
8255  get_cached_date_str_pool_[roundrobin_index_], *timer_queue_pool_[roundrobin_index_],
8256  adaptor_ctx_);
8257  acceptor_.async_accept(p->socket(),
8258  [this, p, &is](boost::system::error_code ec)
8259  {
8260  if (!ec)
8261  {
8262  is.post([p]
8263  {
8264  p->start();
8265  });
8266  }
8267  do_accept();
8268  });
8269  }
8270 
8271  private:
8272  asio::io_service io_service_;
8273  std::vector<std::unique_ptr<asio::io_service>> io_service_pool_;
8274  std::vector<detail::dumb_timer_queue*> timer_queue_pool_;
8275  std::vector<std::function<std::string()>> get_cached_date_str_pool_;
8276  tcp::acceptor acceptor_;
8277  boost::asio::signal_set signals_;
8278 
8279  Handler* handler_;
8280  uint16_t concurrency_{1};
8281  std::string server_name_ = "Crow/0.1";
8282  uint16_t port_;
8283  std::string bindaddr_;
8284  unsigned int roundrobin_index_{};
8285 
8286  std::tuple<Middlewares...>* middlewares_;
8287 
8288 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8289  bool use_ssl_{false};
8290  boost::asio::ssl::context ssl_context_{boost::asio::ssl::context::sslv23};
8291 #endif
8292  typename Adaptor::context* adaptor_ctx_;
8293  };
8294 }
8295 
8296 
8297 
8298 #pragma once
8299 
8300 #include <string>
8301 #include <functional>
8302 #include <memory>
8303 #include <future>
8304 #include <cstdint>
8305 #include <type_traits>
8306 #include <thread>
8307 
8308 
8309 
8310 
8311 
8312 
8313 
8314 
8315 
8316 
8317 
8318 
8319 
8320 
8321 
8322 
8323 
8324 #ifdef CROW_MSVC_WORKAROUND
8325 #define CROW_ROUTE(app, url) app.route_dynamic(url)
8326 #else
8327 #define CROW_ROUTE(app, url) app.route<crow::black_magic::get_parameter_tag(url)>(url)
8328 #endif
8329 
8330 namespace crow
8331 {
8332 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8333  using ssl_context_t = boost::asio::ssl::context;
8334 #endif
8335  template <typename ... Middlewares>
8336  class Crow
8337  {
8338  public:
8339  using self_t = Crow;
8340  using server_t = Server<Crow, SocketAdaptor, Middlewares...>;
8341 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8342  using ssl_server_t = Server<Crow, SSLAdaptor, Middlewares...>;
8343 #endif
8344  Crow()
8345  {
8346  }
8347 
8348  void handle(const request& req, response& res)
8349  {
8350  router_.handle(req, res);
8351  }
8352 
8353  DynamicRule& route_dynamic(std::string&& rule)
8354  {
8355  return router_.new_rule_dynamic(std::move(rule));
8356  }
8357 
8358  template <uint64_t Tag>
8359  auto route(std::string&& rule)
8360  -> typename std::result_of<decltype(&Router::new_rule_tagged<Tag>)(Router, std::string&&)>::type
8361  {
8362  return router_.new_rule_tagged<Tag>(std::move(rule));
8363  }
8364 
8365  self_t& port(std::uint16_t port)
8366  {
8367  port_ = port;
8368  return *this;
8369  }
8370 
8371  self_t& bindaddr(std::string bindaddr)
8372  {
8373  bindaddr_ = bindaddr;
8374  return *this;
8375  }
8376 
8377  self_t& multithreaded()
8378  {
8379  return concurrency(std::thread::hardware_concurrency());
8380  }
8381 
8382  self_t& concurrency(std::uint16_t concurrency)
8383  {
8384  if (concurrency < 1)
8385  concurrency = 1;
8386  concurrency_ = concurrency;
8387  return *this;
8388  }
8389 
8390  void validate()
8391  {
8392  router_.validate();
8393  }
8394 
8395  void run()
8396  {
8397  validate();
8398 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8399  if (use_ssl_)
8400  {
8401  ssl_server_t server(this, bindaddr_, port_, &middlewares_, concurrency_, &ssl_context_);
8402  server.run();
8403  }
8404  else
8405 #endif
8406  {
8407  server_t server(this, bindaddr_, port_, &middlewares_, concurrency_, nullptr);
8408  server.run();
8409  }
8410  }
8411 
8412  void debug_print()
8413  {
8414  CROW_LOG_DEBUG << "Routing:";
8415  router_.debug_print();
8416  }
8417 
8418 #ifdef CROW_ENABLE_SSL
8419  self_t& ssl_file(const std::string& crt_filename, const std::string& key_filename)
8420  {
8421  use_ssl_ = true;
8422  ssl_context_.set_verify_mode(boost::asio::ssl::verify_peer);
8423  ssl_context_.use_certificate_file(crt_filename, ssl_context_t::pem);
8424  ssl_context_.use_private_key_file(key_filename, ssl_context_t::pem);
8425  ssl_context_.set_options(
8426  boost::asio::ssl::context::default_workarounds
8427  | boost::asio::ssl::context::no_sslv2
8428  | boost::asio::ssl::context::no_sslv3
8429  );
8430  return *this;
8431  }
8432 
8433  self_t& ssl_file(const std::string& pem_filename)
8434  {
8435  use_ssl_ = true;
8436  ssl_context_.set_verify_mode(boost::asio::ssl::verify_peer);
8437  ssl_context_.load_verify_file(pem_filename);
8438  ssl_context_.set_options(
8439  boost::asio::ssl::context::default_workarounds
8440  | boost::asio::ssl::context::no_sslv2
8441  | boost::asio::ssl::context::no_sslv3
8442  );
8443  return *this;
8444  }
8445 
8446  self_t& ssl(boost::asio::ssl::context&& ctx)
8447  {
8448  use_ssl_ = true;
8449  ssl_context_ = std::move(ctx);
8450  return *this;
8451  }
8452 
8453 
8454  bool use_ssl_{false};
8455  ssl_context_t ssl_context_{boost::asio::ssl::context::sslv23};
8456 
8457 #else
8458  template <typename T, typename ... Remain>
8459  self_t& ssl_file(T&& t, Remain&&...)
8460  {
8461  // We can't call .ssl() member function unless CROW_ENABLE_SSL is defined.
8462  static_assert(
8463  // make static_assert dependent to T; always false
8464  std::is_base_of<T, void>::value,
8465  "Define CROW_ENABLE_SSL to enable ssl support.");
8466  return *this;
8467  }
8468 
8469  template <typename T>
8470  self_t& ssl(T&& ctx)
8471  {
8472  // We can't call .ssl() member function unless CROW_ENABLE_SSL is defined.
8473  static_assert(
8474  // make static_assert dependent to T; always false
8475  std::is_base_of<T, void>::value,
8476  "Define CROW_ENABLE_SSL to enable ssl support.");
8477  return *this;
8478  }
8479 #endif
8480 
8481  // middleware
8482  using context_t = detail::context<Middlewares...>;
8483  template <typename T>
8484  typename T::context& get_context(const request& req)
8485  {
8486  static_assert(black_magic::contains<T, Middlewares...>::value, "App doesn't have the specified middleware type.");
8487  auto& ctx = *reinterpret_cast<context_t*>(req.middleware_context);
8488  return ctx.template get<T>();
8489  }
8490 
8491  template <typename T>
8492  T& get_middleware()
8493  {
8494  return utility::get_element_by_type<T, Middlewares...>(middlewares_);
8495  }
8496 
8497  private:
8498  uint16_t port_ = 80;
8499  uint16_t concurrency_ = 1;
8500  std::string bindaddr_ = "0.0.0.0";
8501  Router router_;
8502 
8503  std::tuple<Middlewares...> middlewares_;
8504  };
8505  template <typename ... Middlewares>
8506  using App = Crow<Middlewares...>;
8507  using SimpleApp = Crow<>;
8508 };
8509 
8510 
crow::detail::check_after_handle_arity_3
Definition: crow_all.h:7585
h_CON
Definition: crow_all.h:2877
CALLBACK_DATA
#define CALLBACK_DATA(FOR)
Definition: crow_all.h:2761
